definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: A lorry was going to dump sugarcane into the hopper.
sentences.chinese: 拼装车正要倾倒一车甘蔗至转装台的漏斗。

sentences.english: A lorry was dumping sugarcane into the hopper.
sentences.chinese: 拼装车正倾倒一车甘蔗至转装台的漏斗。

sentences.english: So, she put a pocket one of those small parts assembled together.
sentences.chinese: 所以，她把口袋里那些小零件一个一个拼装起来。

sentences.english: This shoe has a built-up heel.
sentences.chinese: 这种鞋子的后跟是拼装式的。

sentences.english: And that's when the first Gundam plastic model kits hit the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 但是拼装模型的上架销售否认了这一点。

sentences.english: Can you put your toy mobile together all by yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你能将你的玩具车自己拼装好吗？

sentences.english: What, for example, is approach to putting together an unassembled item?
sentences.chinese: 比如，用什么方式将零散部件拼装在一起？

sentences.english: Pipeline many do not use a short section of the elbow assembly.
sentences.chinese: 长输管道多不采用短节拼装的弯头。

sentences.english: The product uses assemble air inlet, which is more convenient to assemble and disassemble.
sentences.chinese: 采用拼装进风口鼓风机，拆装更为方便。

sentences.english: The welding and assembling process of heavy girder often results in twisting distortion.
sentences.chinese: 大型薄壁梁在焊接拼装过程中常常会出现扭转变形。

sentences.english: If it is to put together to embark a car, then exist many safe hidden dangers.
sentences.chinese: 如果它是拼装车的话，则存在着许多安全隐患。

sentences.english: The air shower is of different sizes according to its use .
sentences.chinese: 可以按照实际需要拼装成各种长度的风淋尺寸。
